divs: Sighting DetailsKids came in room about 8:30 pm tonight Feb 25 2012 said glowing orb flying crazy all over went and looked like ya ok whatvever looked out window south saw a glowing ball like a star falling slowly then hover dropped from low clouds to right above my neibors garage phones quit working tv power was surging we all felt dizzy light headed almost numb bodied thing then just took off with a big flash left a f...... Streak in thevsky like a shooting star crazy who ever says ufos don't exist your crazy as hell !!!
